title: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Microsoft Purview | Endpoint data loss prevention - Classification globalization support (CCJK)
description:
Microsoft Endpoint DLP will support content authored using double-byte character sets (including Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and Japanese) in service workloads.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/endpoint-dlp-getting-started?view=o365-worldwide
